page.title: DaimlerChrysler Sued Over Car Seat Injury
page.text: DETROIT (Reuters) - DaimlerChrysler AG <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DCX.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DCX.N</A> <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=DCXGn.DE target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">DCXGn.DE</A> has been hit with a multimillion-dollar lawsuit filed by a paraplegic who says the automaker's heated car seats caused him a severe burn injury.
